changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.id, res.name AS grouping_agency, cls.name AS classifier, b.name AS classification, att.name AS authorized_attribute, natt.name AS authorized_network_attribute, base_table.text_value, base_table.integer_value, base_table.numeric_value, base_table.json_value, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM agency_attribute_authorization base_table LEFT JOIN agency_network_authorization na ON base_table.network_authorization = na.id LEFT JOIN agency res ON base_table.grouping_agency = res.id LEFT JOIN relationship cls ON na.classifier = cls.id LEFT JOIN agency b ON na.classification = b.id LEFT JOIN attribute att ON base_table.authorized_attribute = att.id LEFT JOIN attribute natt ON base_table.authorized_network_attribute = natt.id LEFT JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
